text: aur yaad karo jab moosa ne apanee qaum ke logon se kaha, "ai meree qaum ke logon! tum mujhe kyo dukh dete ho, haalaanki tum jaanate ho ki main tumhaaree or bheja hua allaah ka rasool hoon?" phir jab unhonne tedh apanaee to allaah ne bhee unake dil tedh kar die. allaah avagyaakaariyon ko seedha maarg nahin dikhaata
